general.site.title: Taking or offering rides is easier and cheaper at Tripda
general.subject: Subject
home.about: Tripda is a true ride-sharing community for long-distance travel. We are a marketplace connecting drivers and passengers in a simple, fun and convenient way!
home.banner.text4: Share the ride, share the cost, share the earth!
home.banner.text5: Share the ride, save the green!
home.box.about_one: Tripda is an online carpooling application created for people to share rides in a fun, easy and safe way.
home.box.about_three: Our carpoolers are students, young professionals, teachers, artists, and retirees - anyone who wants to meet new people, share stories and make trips fun.
home.box.about_two: Our vision is to transform carpooling into a viable transportation alternative, one which allows passengers to have multiple departure and arrival places and travel with comfort and security while saving up to 50% of a bus fare
home.box.security: With Tripda, you know exactly with whom you're traveling. You can read user ratings of both drivers and passengers made by users that already travelled with them. Besides the login via Facebook, the email and mobile verifications allow us to ensure that only the best drivers and passengers are using Tripda.
home.box.sustainability: Offering or taking a ride is sustainable in four different ways: environmentally, less cars on the road means less pollution; socially, it fosters meetings between diverse people from different backgrounds; culturally, it spreads the concept of the sharing economy; and economically, it helps people save money!
home.email_confirmed_fail: We were unable to confirm the email

home.login_again_modal.title: Please login again

home.welcome.content2: ! We are excited to join the
home.welcome.content3: community in welcoming you to the Tripda ride-sharing marketplace. To create your account, please click on the Facebook login button on the upper right corner of our home page. If you have any questions please feel free to contact us via email at
home.welcome.first_login: Please confirm your e-mail {{ email }} and phone before continuing booking or publishing rides. It makes your profile more trustful and you’ll get more things approved
home.welcome.title: Welcome!
home.why_tripda.icons.convenient.descrip: Find, sort and filter potential carpool buddies, and arrange your carpool trip in seconds with our iOS & Android app!
home.why_tripda.icons.convenient.title: Convenient
home.why_tripda.icons.economical.descrip: Reduce the cost of traveling by sharing! Get to where you need to be at a fraction of the cost of alternative travel methods.
home.why_tripda.icons.economical.title: Economical
home.why_tripda.icons.green.description: Share a ride, support the environment: Reduce gas, pollution and cars on the road!
home.why_tripda.icons.green.title: Green
home.why_tripda.icons.secure.description: Get to know your fellow travelers before your ride begins & pay securely through our app!
home.why_tripda.icons.secure.title: Secure
home.why_tripda.icons.social.description: Make friends and transform a dull ride into an awesome journey!
home.why_tripda.icons.social.title: Social
home.why_tripda.title: Why Tripda
login.error.block_under_eighteen: You have to be at least 18 to use Tripda. We would love to see you again when you turn 18!
login.error.not_authorized: To register or login you should accept the Facebook request.
login_modal.text: In order to offer a ride, you must first log in with your Facebook account
meta.description.home: With Tripda, you can travel more spending less. Taking or offering rides with cool people who will share your ride costs with you.
meta.description.institucional-about-us: Tripda is a free online platform created so individuals can share rides across their countries in a fun and environmentally-friendly way.
meta.description.institucional-contact-u: We work hard to improve our platform. For that reason, your comments are extremely important to us!
meta.description.institucional-how-it-wo: We want to connect real people. For that reason, we must assure we're identifying you correctly. Register through Facebook.
meta.description.institucional-ladies-on: Focused on our female public, we allow them to travel only with other lady drivers and passengers, giving them an even greater sense of safety.
meta.description.institucional-privacy-p: The protection of your personal data is very important! That's why we adopt several practics and strict policies to manage this data.
meta.description.institucional-security: Our concerns towards safety go from User Rating to cell phone number verification.This is all so you can share a ride with an easy mind!
meta.description.institucional-standards: The driver commits to trips he truly has the intention of making. Passengers commit to pay the agreed value to the drivers.
meta.description.institucional-sustainab: Carpooling helps the environment by taking cars off the streets, reducing carbon emissions and easying the traffic, as well as difunding sharing economy.
meta.description.institucional-terms-of-: Anyone of legal age of legally capable that utilizes Tripda services must accept the Terms of Use and every policy and principle that reigns them.
meta.description.institucional-users-rat: Every driver and passenger that offers or take rides at Tripda is rated by other users after the ride, so everyone has a reputation reference viewable by our community.
meta.description.offer-seats: Offer rides to cool people who will share your ride costs with you. At Tripda you know who's traveling with you.
meta.description.partners: With Tripda, you can travel more spending less. Taking or offering rides with cool people who will share your ride costs with you.
meta.description.search_trips: Best rides leaving {{ departureCity }} to {{ destinationCity }} at {{ departureDate }} - Search results at Tripda
meta.description.trip_view: Ride offered by {{ userName }} from {{ departureCity }} to {{ destinationCity }} at {{ departureDate }} at Tripda, The merging markets carpooling platform
meta.description.user_cars: My cars - The passenger will know the brand and model, as well as the available space for luggages and if a certain car is equipped with air conditioning.
meta.description.user_messages: My Messages - Our main goal is to connect drivers and passengers in a safe way, so they can travel more spending less.
meta.description.user_notifications: My notifications - We leave you updated on the status of your rides, so you can travel on an easy mind. Notifications appear on the site and on your e-mail.
meta.description.user_preferences: My preferences - Every user knows what to expect from your ride and can select their ride buddies according to their preferences.
meta.description.user_profile_general: My profile - It's important to complete your profile so other drivers and passengers know just how much fun you are to ride with!
meta.description.user_public_profile: Profile, rides and ratings from {{ userName }} at Tripda, The best ride sharing community in Brazil
meta.description.user_trips: My rides - Optimize the space of your car by establishing scheduled stops along your route, adapting to the needs of your passengers.

payment.bank_account_information: Add Bank Account: Bank Account Information
payment.cash.help.offer:
When you choose to get paid with cash, your passenger will pay you directly at the end of the ride. 
Please remember to check with the passenger(s) that they have enough cash to cover the ride cost, and remind them to pay once you've reached your destination.
payment.cash.help.pay:
When you choose to pay with cash, you pay the driver at the end of the ride. 
Please remember to check if you have enough cash to cover the ride cost, and don’t forget to pay once you've reached your destination.
payment.credit_card.error: You have entered an invalid card number. Please check your entry and try again.
payment.credit_card.help.offer: All fees collected from passengers for your ride are transferred directly to your bank account. Passengers will book seats in your car using a credit card and their payment will be collected at the time the ride is confirmed. We will notify the driver only when the payment is approved. Payments are transferred to your bank account after the ride completes.
payment.credit_card.help.pay:
When you pay rides using credit card and we automatically pay drivers after the ride occurs. 
Your payment is processed when you make the reservation. Don't worry! If the driver does not accept or cancel your ride, the charge will be immediately refunded to you.

Green indicates a fair price requested by the driver.

Passengers can easily identify fairly priced rides according to the color.
